about_the_game:
Dragon's Tower is an RPG Sounds pack of looping music, ambient sounds, and SFX. It includes:

Music
  • Found a Dragon
  • Fight The Dragon
  • Historical Castle

Ambient Sounds
  • Castle Torches in the wall
  • Prisioners Distant Activity

SFX
  • Cage Rattle Hard (4)
  • Cage Ratte Light (4)
  • Castle Destruction Debris (4)
  • Dragon Acid Thrower (3)
  • Dragon Flame Thrower (3)
  • Dragon Ice Thrower (3)
  • Dragon Lighting Thrower (3)
  • Dragon Roar (3)
  • Open Treasure Chest (4)

  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 capabilities
